Willard Tu Speaking to EE Times, Willard Tu, senior director of automotive at Xilinx, said, âEven though radar technology is considered mature, there is still room for innovation. On the other hand, 4D imaging radar can achieve the 300-meter range and take true height measurements as opposed to inferring heights.
